default: A new skill of type {} is trying to connect, do you want to add it to your devices?
I have unregistered this device
The device wasn't registered on my network
Please unplug the device you want to unregister, wait for 5 seconds and plug it back
In which room is this device going to be placed?
Sure, in what room are you placing this new device?
Ok
Done
Ok I stop
Ok, ignoring this device
Ok, I have added this device
I added this new device
Sorry, but I'm busy at the moment, please wait
Wait a second, I'm busy at the moment
Please wait, I'm kindda busy right now
Ok, let's talk in {} then!
Sure, I can talk in {}
No problem, I'm switching to {}
I'm sorry, but I don't what language to switch to
I'm sorry but I don't speak {}
Sorry but I don't know {}
I'm sorry but I couldn't switch the language
Sorry, the language switch failed for some reason
Sorry, you don't have any active skill to handle this request
I can't, there's no project id set in my configurations
I'm sorry but I can't do any update while being offline
Ok, will do! Note that it might take a while!
Sure, I'll update my bundles. This will take some time!
Sorry, I can't, you haven't provided me with the snips console credentials
Ok, I just updated my bundles
My bundles just updated
Sorry, I couldn't update my bundles
I'm sorry, something went wrong updating my bundles
Are you sure you want to reboot?
Rebooting takes time, are you sure?
Do you also want to reboot my external skills?
Shall I also reboot my external skills?
Ok, rebooting now!
Going down, see you soon again
I have just rebooted as you asked
Hi again! I just rebooted!
I just rebooted, I'm now rebooting all the external skills
Hi again! Rebooting all the external skills as asked
Ok, aborting reboot
Ok, I'm cancelling the reboot
Ok, just a second!
That's gonna be easy, taking over Sonos
Sure, taking over Sonos!
Sorry, no Sonos system here
I can't, there's no Sonos here
I can't find any Sonos device here
Ok, letting Sonos go
Sonos! Be free!
Sonos! I release you from my control!
I did as asked
Here I am now
I did as you wanted
Ok, I changed it
Sure, I moved
I updated my configuration
Sorry, but displaying on other rooms is not yet supported
I unfortunately can't do that yet
Ok, displayed!
Ok, done
Displaying as asked!
What do you want to display?
What is it I should display?
What should I display?
I could connect back to internet, switching back to online ASR
I lost internet connection and fell back to Snips ASR
Hey, just letting you know I'm listening again
I'm back to listening for you
Ok, I'm waiting on the new device for the next 5 minutes, you can now power it
I'm sorry, but for that I need the Tasmota skill to be enabled

requireZigbeeSkill: I'm sorry, but for that I need the ZigBee skill to be enabled

default: What kind of device do you want to add?
Sure, what type of device?
And what kind of ESP device? Switch, PIR, etc?
Great, I can handle the entire process. Connect the ESP device in flash mode directly in one of my USB ports
The flashing process is done! I will now configure the device for you. Please, unplug and replug it!
Found it, thank you! Now configuring it!
Got it! Hang on tight, this is gonna take a while!
I couldn't find any ESP device on my USB ports, I'm aborting the device addition
Installing your esp device failed unfortunately, I'm really sorry for that
I'm sorry, I don't know this type of hardware
Ok, I have flashed your esp device with Tasmota, you can now unplug it and power it.
You didn't specify any configuration, so tell me, which one?
Which configuration are you looking for?
Ok, canceling but without user I cannot start, going down.
Welcome to Project Alice! There seems to be no user defined yet, let's do this! Please, tell me your name.

addAdminPin: <s>We need some layer of security since you are the administrator!</s><s>For that you need to define a pin code that has 4 digits.</s><s>Make sure to remember it though, you will need it to use my interface, adding new users or accessing priviledged functions.</s><s>Please tell me your four digits pin.</s>
addUserPin: <s>Let's set a pin code to protect your account.</s><s>Please give me a 4 digits code.</s><s>Make sure to remember it, it will allow you to access priviledged functions!</s>
addPinInvalid: I need four digits, your pin code is not valid. Please, give me another pin code.
Four digits please, your pin code is not ok. Please, give me another pin code.
addWrongPin: Ok, my mistake, sorry, what's it then?
I'm sorry, tell me you pin again.

default: Did I understand correctly? Your name is {}?
Is it correct, your name is {}?
Ok {}, I have added you to the administrator group
Sorry for my mistake, what's the name then? You can also spell it
There seems to be a user named {} already existing. I need another name please
Ok {}, I have added you! If you want me to recognize you based on your voice you need to create a personal wake word. It is not obligatory but recommended. Do you want to do that?
Ok, I understand, keep in mind I won't be able to define if you are home, sleeping, play games or remember stuff about you

<s>Ok! I need three samples of you calling me by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Alice" <break time="150ms"/></s><s>Remember to be in a calm environment for this to work, noise or parasites make this impossible</s><s>Let's do this, call me!</s>

wakewordCaptureFailed: Something went wrong capturing the wake word. Do you want me to try to fix the problem and retry?
howWasTheCapture: I just played a trimmed version of you speaking the hotword. Was it ok? If not I can trim it more or less, it needs to be cut pretty close to your speaking... Say "Ok", "Trim more", "Trim less" or "Restart"
howWasThisCapture: How was it? Say "Ok", "Trim more", "Trim less" or "Restart"
howWasTheCaptureNow: And now? Say "Ok", "Trim more", "Trim less" or "Restart"
sampleOk: <s>Great, good to hear, {} to go!</s><s>Call me again by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Alice" <break time="150ms"/></s>
<s>Cool, just {} to go!</s><s>Call me again by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Alice" <break time="150ms"/></s>
<s>I need {} more.</s><s>Call me again by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Alice" <break time="150ms"/></s>
restartSample: <s>Ok, let's try this one again.</s> <s>Call me again by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Alice" <break time="150ms"/></s>
<s>Sure, let's restart.</s> <s>Call me again by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Alice" <break time="150ms"/></s>
wakewordCaptureDone: You did it, I have the three samples and you should be now able to call me by my name and I should be able to recognize you! Enjoy my services!
wakewordCaptureTooNoisy: There seems to be too much noise or your microphone is too sensitive, I couldn't capture the wake word. Do you want to try again?
I think there's either too much noise or your microphone's settings are too sensitive, I can't capture the wake word. Shall we try again?
cancellingWakewordCapture: Ok, let's forget about it for now. You can retry when the environment is calmer. For now you can call me by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Snips", but I won't be able to recognize you though.
addUserWhatsTheName: I can do that! So, miss or mister new user, what's your name?
Sure thing! Ok, unknown person, tell me your name!
No problemo, gladly! What's you name miss or mister new user?
addUserWhatAccessLevel: What access level do you want to grant? There's admin, default, kid, worker and guest
What permissions do you grant? You have the choice between admin, default, kid, worker and guest
Tell me what access level I should set? Admin? Default? Kid, worker or guest?
addUserConfirmUsername: Ok, did I understand correctly, the name is {}?
Did I understand correctly? The name is {}
Am I correct? The name is {}
addUserConfirmed: Ok, I have added {} as {}! If you want me to recognize this user based on his voice he needs to create a personal wake word. It is not obligatory but recommended. Do you want to do that?
addUserAddWakewordAccepted: <s>Ok {}! I need three samples of you calling me by saying <break time="100ms"/> "Hey Alice" <break time="150ms"/></s><s>Remember to be in a calm environment for this to work, noise or parasites make this impossible</s><s>Let's do this, call me!</s>
addUserAddWakewordDenied: Ok, I understand, keep in mind I won't be able to define if {} is home, sleeping, playing games or remember stuff about {}.

default: If you want to access this part, I need to authenticate you. Call me by my name please!
To access this part of the interface I need to authenticate you. Please call me by my name
short: Call me by my name please

default: Hey {}! I need your pin code now, you can either speak it now or enter it on your interface!
Hi {}. To continue I need your personal pin code. You can tell it to me now or enter it on the interface.
short: Say or enter pin code on the interface

userAuthUnknown: I'm sorry but I did not recognize you
Sorry, but I don't know who you are
userAuthAccessLevelTooLow: Sorry {} but your access level is too low
Unfortunately {}, your access level is too low
authFailed: Sorry, this is not correct, I can't let you go further
authOk: Ok, you are verified, you have now access
Cool, it's correct, you have now access
